headline: Gen Digital Links AI Agent Security With Equifax Powered Consumer Protection
summary: Gen Digital (NasdaqGS:GEN) has launched its Gen Agent Trust Hub to support safer adoption of autonomous AI agents. The company is also expanding its partnership with Equifax to broaden consumer protection and financial wellness offerings. These moves highlight a push to connect AI driven cybersecurity with credit and identity tools for consumers. Gen Digital sits at the intersection of consumer cybersecurity and identity protection, and the new Agent Trust Hub fits directly into that focus...
